医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
印第安纳州正在权衡医院垄断，其他地方的官员也在审查类似交易这座拥有 58,000 人口的城市的当地人习惯于在铁路道口等待每日数十列货运列车中的一列通过。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Indiana-weighs-hospital-monopoly-as-officials-elsewhere-scrutinize-similar-deals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Indiana-weighs-hospital-monopoly-as-officials-elsewhere-scrutinize-similar-deals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a321f17-8241-44a5-80dc-00e9b9475473 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 07:39:01 -0400 Indiana weighs hospital monopoly as officials elsewhere scrutinize similar deals
加州立法者保留对老年残疾移民的援助加州立法者周四通过了 2024-25 年预算，拒绝了州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 削减对缺乏合法居住权的低收入老年、盲人和残疾移民的家庭支持服务的提议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/California-lawmakers-preserve-aid-to-older-disabled-immigrants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/California-lawmakers-preserve-aid-to-older-disabled-immigrants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c87ccdc-09d3-41b9-8b98-60d5cf39db39 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 07:37:37 -0400 California lawmakers preserve aid to older, disabled immigrants

关于儿童、孕妇、75 岁以上成年人和糖尿病前期高危人群维生素 D 摄入量的新建议在本研究中，研究人员制定了补充维生素 D 以预防疾病的指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-recommendations-on-vitamin-D-intake-for-children-pregnant-people-adults-over-75-and-those-with-high-风险-前驱糖尿病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-recommendations-on-vitamin-D-intake-for-children-pregnant-people-adults-over-75-and-those-with-high-风险-糖尿病前期.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8526d31c-8af9-4da6-91cf-4b4c4f8e11fe Fri, 14 Jun 2024 06:47:00 -0400 New recommendations on vitamin D intake for children, pregnant people, adults over 75 and those with high-risk prediabetes
Sphere Fluidics 荣获人类投资者金奖认证Sphere Fluidics 是一家领先的基于微流体技术的单细胞分析和分离解决方案的领先供应商，今天宣布它已获得“我们投资于人”金奖认证，这是由 Investors in People (IIP) 颁发的一项享有盛誉的奖项。该奖项是对公司致力于卓越人员管理和持续改进工作场所实践的认可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Sphere-Fluidics-awarded-gold-accreditation-by-investors-in-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Sphere-Fluidics-awarded-gold-accreditation-by-investors-in-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c9d0f62-f4fc-4812-93ca-d54cfb19d3d3 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 06:47:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics awarded gold accreditation by investors in people

研究发现，气候变化带来的高温对儿童的大脑造成持久的风险温度暴露对产前和幼儿期儿童心理健康和认知的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Climate-change-heat-poses- permanent-brain-risks-for-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Climate-change-heat-poses- permanent-brain-risks-for-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=894eec5c-db2e-49a0-8332-7ba5ba0477f4 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 04:44:00 -0400 Climate change heat poses lasting brain risks for children, study finds
生物安全柜的主要见解在本次采访中，行业专家 Seth DePenning 深入探讨了生物安全柜 (BSC) 的关键作用，并强调了 HEPA 过滤器的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Key-Insights-into-Biological-Safety-Cabinets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Key-Insights-into-Biological-Safety-Cabinets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e33698c9-f8a1-495e-90f2-807e8acbbece Fri, 14 Jun 2024 02:21:00 -0400 Key Insights into Biological Safety Cabinets
短期戒酒会恶化酒精使用障碍患者的肠道健康《PLoS ONE》发表的一项研究发现，AUD 患者短期戒酒会加剧肠道菌群失调并增加精神困扰，与预期的改善相反。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Short-term-alcohol-abstinence-worsens-gut-health-in-alcohol-use-disorder-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Short-term-alcohol-abstinence-worsens-gut-health-in-alcohol-use-disorder-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4c142e5-6fac-4361-be8f-ada77f3a4798 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 01:38:00 -0400 Short-term alcohol abstinence worsens gut health in alcohol use disorder patients
谷歌推出 PHIA：人工智能驱动的可穿戴健康数据洞察Google 工程师开发了 PHIA，这是一个基于法学硕士的代理系统，它使用信息检索和高级代码生成来分析来自可穿戴健康追踪器的行为健康数据，提供个性化的健康见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Google-unveils-PHIA-AI-powered-insights-from-your-wearable-health-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Google-unveils-PHIA-AI-powered-insights-from-your-wearable-health-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ecf469c-5e3e-47f9-8699-b820228d9dc9 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 00:58:00 -0400 Google unveils PHIA: AI-powered insights from your wearable health data
